r_ele.r: じんこうにかいしゃする

sense.gloss: to become well-known, to become common knowledge, to become famous, to be on everyone's lips
namasu, dish of raw fish and vegetables seasoned in vinegar

r_ele.r: あつものにこりてなますをふく

sense.gloss: a burnt child dreads the fire, once bitten twice shy, to become overcautious from a bad experience
thinly-sliced salmon head cartilage and daikon seasoned with vinegar
boiled chrysanthemum petals pickled in vinegar
boiled chrysanthemum petals pickled in vinegar

words.gloss: to become well-known, to become common knowledge, to become famous, to be on everyone's lips
